typ.description: A field with the value jwt-client-attestation-pop

alg.description: An identifier for a JWS asymmetric digital signature algorithm. It MUST NOT be none or an identifier for a symmetric algorithm

kid.description: An identifier that refers to a specific public key of the private key used to sign the WTE. This is used, for instance, to choose among a set of keys within a JWK Set

x5c.description: An URI that refers to a certificate chainspecific public key of the private key used to sign the WTE. This is used, for instance, to choose among a set of keys within a JWK Set
